section:
Référence de la classe Team Team Graphe de collaboration de Team:
Champs de données
const ROLE_REQUESTER = \CommonITILActor::REQUESTER
const ROLE_OBSERVER = \CommonITILActor::OBSERVER
const ROLE_ASSIGNED = \CommonITILActor::ASSIGN
const ROLE_OWNER = 5
const ROLE_WRITER = 6
const ROLE_MEMBER = 7
Description détaillée
Class for a team that may contain members of multiple types (users, groups, etc) of various roles. Depuis
10.0.0
Documentation des champs
ROLE_ASSIGNED ROLE_ASSIGNEDTeam TeamROLE_ASSIGNED
const ROLE_ASSIGNED = \CommonITILActor::ASSIGN
A team member that is assigned to the ticket, change, problem, etc.
ROLE_MEMBER ROLE_MEMBERTeam TeamROLE_MEMBER
const ROLE_MEMBER = 7
A general team member for when a more specific role is not applicable. Typically, this is used for Projects for anyone who is not the Project manager.
ROLE_OBSERVER ROLE_OBSERVERTeam TeamROLE_OBSERVER
const ROLE_OBSERVER = \CommonITILActor::OBSERVER
A team member that is watching the ticket, change, problem, etc.
ROLE_OWNER ROLE_OWNERTeam TeamROLE_OWNER
const ROLE_OWNER = 5
A team member who is an owner of the item. Typically, this is used for Projects (Project managers).
ROLE_REQUESTER ROLE_REQUESTERTeam TeamROLE_REQUESTER
const ROLE_REQUESTER = \CommonITILActor::REQUESTER
A team member that is requesting the ticket, change, problem, etc.
ROLE_WRITER ROLE_WRITERTeam TeamROLE_WRITER
const ROLE_WRITER = 6
The member who "wrote" or submitted a ticket, change, or problem.
La documentation de cette classe a été générée à partir du fichier suivant : public/glpi/src/Team/Team.php
